name: End of Blessing
description:
ATTENTION!

GAME MAY CAUSE EPILEPSY!

ALL GAME MECHANICS AND CONTROLS ARE IN THE GAME DESCRIPTION ONLY!

Description:

You are the mistake of one of the gods, who is a terrible dictator. Your goal is to kill him and free the souls of the creatures he tortures and kills.

Control:

W - forward

S - back

A - left

D - right

Space - shoot(You can only shoot then the boss starting to attack you)

Game mechanics:

1. If you touch the walls you will lose control of the soul (if you lose it completely - you will die)!

2. If you do not use the A or D keys, then your soul control will also decrease!

(using W and S will still decrease your state of soul!)
